about_the_game:
Story & Background

Eternal Lust: Zenyh City invites you to step into the shoes of David as you embark on a captivating journey to the enigmatic land of Zenyh City. This immersive role-playing adventure combines exploration, puzzle-solving, and character development to create a truly unique experience. Interact with the environment, solve challenges and puzzles, and enhance Dravid's talents and perks, all of which will play a crucial role in your dating encounters.

Features

  • 5 unique gorgeous girls with different personalities, preferences, and backgrounds. You will experience their story, life, and so on. And various interactions follow up with the character.

  • A Fusion of Medieval and Sci-Fi Worlds: Experience a unique universe where the ancient meets the futuristic, blending the best of both worlds.

  • Strategic Match-3 Puzzles: Make the right decisions in unique match-3 puzzles to optimize your dating experience and take your relationships to the next level.

  • Engaging Mini-Games: Participate in a variety of mini-games, including exercise, shooting ranges, fishing, and growing magical herbs.

  • Shopping & Gifting: Explore various city locations to buy items and gifts for the many kawaii girls you'll meet.

  • Stunning Visuals: Enjoy beautiful backgrounds and artworks that combine Asian and Western styles for a visually captivating experience.

  • Relaxing Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the game’s chill and soothing music as you explore and interact.

  • Embrace the Challenge: Overcome obstacles and enjoy a fulfilling dating experience as you navigate the complexities of Zenyh City.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
The game contains explicit adult themes, including nudity, violence, and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Eternal Lust: Zenyh City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 《Eternal Lust: Zenyh City》is a match-3 puzzle game with dating elements. Your job is to complete all the missions and adventures around you to help all the girls on your journey.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
